title.text: Subordinators with Elaborative Meanings in Czech and English

abstractContent.text: This paper is focused on description of hy­ potactic constructions (constructions with sub­ ordinating conjunctions) with "elaborative" meanings.
In dependency­based linguistic lit­ erature, they are referred to as hypotactic co­ ordinations or also (a subset of) false depen­ dent clauses.
The analysis makes use of syn­ tax­ and discourse­annotated corpora of Czech and English and thus offers an empirically grounded contrastive study of the phenomena.
